cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 23rd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: George, our cool coastal caravan is a lovely private cosy caravan set up. George overlooks the beautiful Karikari Beach and is a 10-minute drive to some of the Far Norths most stunning beaches.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates
